The '''Conch River''', or the '''Sky Path River''', was a river of central [[Netheril]] that was a tributary of the [[Watercourse]].

Geography.Flora & Fauna: The Sky Path River was believed to be sacred by the [[Rengarth]] [[barbarian]]s that named it. These folk believed it to be the lifeblood of the [[deities]] that roamed the nearby mountains.
